body: So I was wondering how much xp do you need to level up in nebula. Also is there anyway to check the amount of xp you have?
body_tagged: So I was wondering how much xp do you need to level up in nebula. Also is there anyway to check the amount of xp you have?
title: how much xp do you need

replies.body: 12200 :) So you need to get 6100 kills if your doing that :)
replies.body_tagged: 12200 :) So you need to get 6100 kills if your doing that :)

replies.body: 12200 to be exact like vsplesk said, but its possible to prestige with 12199 xp
replies.body_tagged: 12200 to be exact like vsplesk said, but its possible to prestige with 12199 xp

replies.body: 12199* huehuehuehue You need 12199 to prestige, idk about  each individual level.
replies.body_tagged: 12199* huehuehuehue You need 12199 to prestige, idk about  each individual level.

replies.body: I dunno. When I am waiting for a game in Nebula I do see an xp bar with xp in it, so maybe that has something to do with your q.
replies.body_tagged: I dunno. When I am waiting for a game in Nebula I do see an xp bar with xp in it, so maybe that has something to do with your q.

replies.body:
Here; (: http://avicus.net/forums/292161723

You can check your XP by looking at your XP bar in spectate mode, or when you get a kill, the number next to your kill says your XP amount.
replies.body_tagged:
Here; (: http://avicus.net/forums/292161723

You can check your XP by looking at your XP bar in spectate mode, or when you get a kill, the number next to your kill says your XP amount.

replies.body: One more thing I thought getting kills was the only way to get do besides voting
replies.body_tagged: One more thing I thought getting kills was the only way to get do besides voting

replies.body:
In Nebula you get 7 Xp for destroying a monument.
in Nexus you get 5 Xp for your team winning.
replies.body_tagged:
In Nebula you get 7 Xp for destroying a monument.
in Nexus you get 5 Xp for your team winning.

reply_to.body: One more thing I thought getting kills was the only way to get do besides voting
reply_to.body_tagged: One more thing I thought getting kills was the only way to get do besides voting

replies.body: One more thing emeraldsword said it's 12200 xp to prestige so 6100 but I seem to only get 1 xp per kill and 2 on occation why is that
replies.body_tagged: One more thing emeraldsword said it's 12200 xp to prestige so 6100 but I seem to only get 1 xp per kill and 2 on occation why is that

replies.body: In CTH, you get 1 xp a kill if you're a non-donor, in nebula and nexus, you get 2 xp a kill as a non-donor.
replies.body_tagged: In CTH, you get 1 xp a kill if you're a non-donor, in nebula and nexus, you get 2 xp a kill as a non-donor.

replies.body: Hm cause like I said I normally get one xp per kill and I'm a non donor
replies.body_tagged: Hm cause like I said I normally get one xp per kill and I'm a non donor

replies.body: Are you playing nebula? Cause if you only get 1 xp a kill then thats weird...
replies.body_tagged: Are you playing nebula? Cause if you only get 1 xp a kill then thats weird...

replies.body: You only get one experience point per kill in Nebula on TDM (Team Deathmatch) or one-hit kill maps.
replies.body_tagged: You only get one experience point per kill in Nebula on TDM (Team Deathmatch) or one-hit kill maps.
